entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Murdochville

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
